entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:34 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
